pull.title: Replace testnet with signet as a default network for Android
pull.body: Signet looks a more proper testing network, and it requires less resources.

events.message:
qt: Replace testnet with signet as a default network for Android

Signet looks a more proper testing network, and it requires less
resources.

events.body: Concept ACK from my side. However, I would like to hear other reviewers' perspectives.
Weak Concept NACK. If testnet is really too burdensome, maybe it's time to reset it, but I don't see a reason to obsolete it in favour of signet.

@luke-jr 
> ... I don't see a reason to obsolete it in favour of signet.

```
$ du -h testnet3/blocks
29G	testnet3/blocks
$ du -h signet/blocks
206M	signet/blocks
```

On devices with constrained capabilities signet is more comfortable to test non-pruned nodes.

rename.from: qt: Replace testnet with signet as a default network for Android
rename.to: Replace testnet with signet as a default network for Android

events.body:
Anyone who needs signet could apply this patch locally.

Closing.
